tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trending_topics (
  topic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  topic_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  mentions_count INT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaMentions (
    mention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mention_text TEXT,
    mention_date DATE,
    topic_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (topic_id) REFERENCES TrendingTopics(topic_id)
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_mentions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_id UUID NOT NULL,
    social_media_platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mention_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    mention_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE news_articles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_id UUID NOT NULL,
    article_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    article_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    publication_date TIMESTAMP
);
